tool_description: Analyzes shipping routes and identifies optimization opportunities for improved efficiency and reduced costs.

shipment_data_id.description: Reference ID for previously retrieved shipping data

optimization_objective.description: Primary optimization goal: cost, speed, reliability, or balanced

geographic_scope.description: Geographic scope for analysis: local, regional, national, international

error_messages: Invalid shipment data ID: The provided data reference cannot be found or has expired.
Invalid optimization objective: Use cost, speed, reliability, or balanced.
Invalid geographic scope: Use local, regional, national, or international.
Insufficient route data: Not enough routing information available for meaningful analysis.
Invalid constraint: Supported constraints include weight_limits, time_windows, vehicle_types, hazmat_restrictions.
usage: Provide shipment_data_id and optimization_objective. Set geographic_scope and route_constraints to tailor the analysis to specific requirements.

potential_savings.description: Estimated cost and time savings from optimization
